title: Miniature from the Emerson-White Hours
description: Miniature from the Emerson-White Hours; Master of the Houghton Miniatures (Flemish, active about 1476 - 1480); Ghent (probably), Belgium; late 1470s - about 1480; Tempera colors and gold paint on parchment; Leaf: 12.5 x 9 cm (4 15/16 x 3 9/16 in.); Ms. 60; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
